meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characterized by industry.
meanings.sent1: The factory workers wore protective gear in the industrial setting.
meanings.sent2: The city's economy heavily relies on industrial production.
meanings.sent3: The industrial robots had a dance-off during the break.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an industrial machine, constantly churning out ideas.
meanings.sent5: The smokestacks painted an industrial skyline against the sunset.

meanings.sent1: The new machinery proved to be very industrial in design.
meanings.sent2: The materials used were specifically chosen for their industrial durability.
meanings.sent3: The industrial strength glue held the pieces together with ease.
meanings.sent4: His voice had an industrial quality, strong and resonant.
meanings.sent5: The industrial-grade tools were essential for the job.

meanings.definition: Engaged in or concerned with industry.
meanings.sent1: The industrial nations collaborated on the trade agreement.
meanings.sent2: She had an industrial mindset, always thinking about production efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The industrial leaders gathered for a conference on innovation.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was an industrial partnership, always working together.
meanings.sent5: He approached the problem with an industrial determination.
